languages.text: All allies that are currently affected by any of the psyker's powers gain the perfect timing effect. Perfect Timing: when an ally under this effect {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, if this ally has a weapon capable of reaching the attacker and has an attack that costs 1 or less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, that ally immediately counter-attacks with this weapon, and the perfect timing effect fades.
languages.original_text: Все союзники, на которых действует какая-либо психосила псайкера, получают эффект "подходящий момент". Подходящий момент: когда союзник с этим эффектом {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атаки или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} ее, он немедленно совершает контратаку, если у него есть оружие, способное достать до атаковавшего противника, и атака, требующая не более 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. После этого эффект "подходящий момент" снимается.

traits.locale_text: All allies that are currently affected by any Psyker's power gain the Perfect Timing effect. Perfect Timing: When an ally under this effect dodges or parries an attack, if this ally has a weapon, capable of reaching the attacker, and has an attack that costs 1 or less AP, that ally immediately counterattacks with this weapon, and the Perfect Timing effect fades.

All allies that are currently affected by any of the psyker's powers gain the perfect timing effect. Perfect Timing: when an ally under this effect dodges or parries an attack, if this ally has a weapon capable of reaching the attacker and has an attack that costs 1 or less AP, that ally immediately counterattacks with this weapon, and the perfect timing effect fades.

All allies that are currently affected by any of the psyker's powers gain the perfect timing effect. Perfect Timing: when an ally under this effect {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, if this ally has a weapon capable of reaching the attacker and has an attack that costs 1 or less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, that ally immediately counterattacks with this weapon, and the perfect timing effect fades.

All allies that are currently affected by any of the psyker's powers gain the perfect timing effect. Perfect Timing: when an ally under this effect {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, if this ally has a weapon capable of reaching the attacker and has an attack that costs 1 or less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, that ally immediately counterattacks with this weapon, and the perfect timing effect fades.

languages.text: 所有受到灵能者任意力量影响的盟友，都会获得“完美时机”效果。 完美时机：当受到此效果影响的盟友成功{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击时，如果该盟友的武器能够攻击到攻击者，而且此武器的攻击耗费不超过1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，则该盟友会立刻使用该武器进行反击。在此之后，“完美时机”效果消失。
languages.original_text: All allies that are currently affected by any of the psyker's powers gain the perfect timing effect. Perfect Timing: when an ally under this effect {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, if this ally has a weapon capable of reaching the attacker and has an attack that costs 1 or less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, that ally immediately counter-attacks with this weapon, and the perfect timing effect fades.

traits.locale_text: 所有受到灵能者任意力量影响的盟友，都会获得“完美时机”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。 完美时机：当受到此效果影响的盟友成功闪避或招架攻击时，如果该盟友的武器能够攻击到攻击者，而且此武器的攻击耗费不超过1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，则该盟友会立刻使用该武器进行反击。在此之后，“完美时机”效果消失。

所有受到灵能者任意力量影响的盟友，都会获得“完美时机”效果。 完美时机：当受到此效果影响的盟友成功{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击时，如果该盟友的武器能够攻击到攻击者，而且此武器的攻击耗费不超过1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，则该盟友会立刻使用该武器进行反击。在此之后，“完美时机”效果消失。

languages.text: Todos los aliados afectados por cualquiera de los poderes del psíquico obtienen el efecto en el momento justo. En el momento justo: cuando un aliado bajo este efecto {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} un ataque, si tiene un arma capaz de alcanzar a su atacante y un ataque que cueste 1 o menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, ese aliado contraataca de inmediato con dicha arma y pierde el efecto en el momento justo.
languages.original_text: All allies that are currently affected by any of the psyker's powers gain the perfect timing effect. Perfect Timing: when an ally under this effect {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, if this ally has a weapon capable of reaching the attacker and has an attack that costs 1 or less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, that ally immediately counter-attacks with this weapon, and the perfect timing effect fades.

traits.locale_text: Todos los aliados afectados por cualquiera de los poderes del psíquico obtienen el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} en el momento justo. En el momento justo: cuando un aliado bajo este efecto esquive o pare un ataque, si tiene un arma capaz de alcanzar a su atacante y un ataque que cueste 1 o menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, ese aliado contraataca de inmediato con dicha arma y pierde el efecto en el momento justo.

languages.text: 現時点で異能者のいずれかの能力の効果を受けている仲間全員に、完璧なタイミングの効果を付与する。 完璧なタイミング：この効果を受けている仲間が攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}とき、この仲間が攻撃者に届く武器を所有していて攻撃コストが1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}未満なら、その武器を使った反撃が即座に発動し、完璧なタイミングの効果は消える。
languages.original_text: All allies that are currently affected by any of the psyker's powers gain the perfect timing effect. Perfect Timing: when an ally under this effect {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, if this ally has a weapon capable of reaching the attacker and has an attack that costs 1 or less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, that ally immediately counter-attacks with this weapon, and the perfect timing effect fades.

traits.locale_text: 現時点で異能者のいずれかの能力の効果を受けている仲間全員に、完璧なタイミングの効果を付与する。 完璧なタイミング：この効果を受けている仲間が攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}とき、この仲間が攻撃者に届く武器を所有していて攻撃コストが1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}未満なら、その武器を使った反撃が即座に発動し、完璧なタイミングの効果は消える。

現時点で異能者のいずれかの能力の効果を受けている仲間全員に、完璧なタイミングの効果を付与する。 完璧なタイミング：この効果を受けている仲間が攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}とき、この仲間が攻撃者に届く武器を所有していて攻撃コストが1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}未満なら、その武器を使った反撃が即座に発動し、完璧なタイミングの効果は消える。

languages.text: Все союзники, на которых действует какая-либо психосила псайкера, получают эффект "подходящий момент". Подходящий момент: когда союзник с этим эффектом {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атаки или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} ее, он немедленно совершает контратаку, если у него есть оружие, способное достать до атаковавшего противника, и атака, требующая не более 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. После этого эффект "подходящий момент" снимается.
languages.original_text: All allies that are currently affected by any of the psyker's powers gain the perfect timing effect. Perfect Timing: when an ally under this effect {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, if this ally has a weapon capable of reaching the attacker and has an attack that costs 1 or less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, that ally immediately counter-attacks with this weapon, and the perfect timing effect fades.

traits.locale_text: Все союзники, на которых действует какая-либо психосила псайкера, получают {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} "подходящий момент". Подходящий момент: когда союзник с этим эффектом уклоняется от атаки или парирует ее, он немедленно совершает контратаку, если у него есть оружие, способное достать до атаковавшего противника, и атака, требующая не более 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. После этого эффект "подходящий момент" снимается.

Все союзники, на которых действует какая-либо психосила псайкера, получают {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} "подходящий момент". Подходящий момент: когда союзник с этим эффектом уклоняется от атаки или парирует ее, он немедленно совершает контратаку, если у него есть оружие, способное достать до атаковавшего противника, и атака, требующая не более 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. После этого эффект "подходящий момент" снимается.

languages.text: Sämtliche Verbündeten, die gerade von einer Kraft der Psionikers beeinflusst werden, erlangen den Effekt Perfektes Timing. Perfektes Timing: Wenn ein Verbündeter, der unter diesem Effekt steht, einem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g} oder einen {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g}, geschieht Folgendes: Verfügt dieser Verbündete über eine Waffe, die den Angreifer erreichen kann und einen Angriff bietet, der 1 oder weniger {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet, führt dieser Verbündete augenblicklich mit dieser Waffe einen Gegenangriff aus, worauf der Effekt Perfektes Timing verschwindet.
languages.original_text: All allies that are currently affected by any of the psyker's powers gain the perfect timing effect. Perfect Timing: when an ally under this effect {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, if this ally has a weapon capable of reaching the attacker and has an attack that costs 1 or less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, that ally immediately counter-attacks with this weapon, and the perfect timing effect fades.

traits.locale_text: Sämtliche Verbündeten, die gerade von einer Kraft der Psionikers beeinflusst werden, erlangen den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} Perfektes Timing. Perfektes Timing: Wenn ein Verbündeter, der unter diesem Effekt steht, einem Angriff ausweicht oder einen pariert, geschieht Folgendes: Verfügt dieser Verbündete über eine Waffe, die den Angreifer erreichen kann und einen Angriff bietet, der 1 oder weniger {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet, führt dieser Verbündete augenblicklich mit dieser Waffe einen Gegenangriff aus, worauf der Effekt Perfektes Timing verschwindet.

languages.text: Tous les alliés auxquels s'applique actuellement un des pouvoirs du psyker bénéficient de l'effet Timing impeccable. Timing impeccable : lorsqu'un allié qui bénéficie de cet effet {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} une attaque, s'il dispose d'une arme capable d'atteindre l'attaquant ainsi que d'une attaque coûtant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} ou moins, il contre-attaque immédiatement à l'aide de cette arme, suite à quoi l'effet Timing impeccable se dissipe.
languages.original_text: All allies that are currently affected by any of the psyker's powers gain the perfect timing effect. Perfect Timing: when an ally under this effect {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, if this ally has a weapon capable of reaching the attacker and has an attack that costs 1 or less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, that ally immediately counter-attacks with this weapon, and the perfect timing effect fades.

traits.locale_text: Tous les alliés auxquels s'applique actuellement un des pouvoirs du psyker bénéficient de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Timing Parfait. Timing Parfait : lorsqu'un allié qui bénéficie de cet effet esquive ou pare une attaque, s'il dispose d'une arme capable d'atteindre l'attaquant ainsi que d'une attaque coûtant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} ou moins, il contre-attaque immédiatement à l'aide de cette arme, suite à quoi l'effet Timing Parfait se dissipe.

languages.text: Ruhsezerin herhangi bir gücünün hâlihazırda etkisi altında olan tüm dost birimler, kusursuz zamanlama etkisi kazanırlar. Kusursuz Zamanlama: Bu etki altındaki bir dost birim, bir saldırıya karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yaptığında saldırgana ulaşabilecek bir silahı ve 1 veya daha az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcayan bir saldırısı varsa o silahla anında karşı saldırı yapar ve kusursuz zamanlama etkisi ortadan kaybolur.
languages.original_text: All allies that are currently affected by any of the psyker's powers gain the perfect timing effect. Perfect Timing: when an ally under this effect {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, if this ally has a weapon capable of reaching the attacker and has an attack that costs 1 or less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, that ally immediately counter-attacks with this weapon, and the perfect timing effect fades.
